## serialization.blocks.BlockSerializer class

Serializer for saving and loading block state.

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.blocks.blockserializer.clear.md) |  | Disposes of any blocks that exist on the workspace. |
|  [load(state, workspace)](./blockly.serialization.blocks.blockserializer.load.md) |  | Deserializes the blocks defined by the given state into the given workspace. |
|  [save(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.blocks.blockserializer.save.md) |  | Serializes the blocks of the given workspace. |
